items.title: How the Cloud Is Putting the Sizzle Back Into Business Intelligence: Tech News «
items.description: How the Cloud Is Putting the Sizzle Back Into Business Intelligence: Business  Intelligence is a multibillion-doll... http://bit.ly/cru0Rt
items.content:encoded: How the Cloud Is Putting the Sizzle Back Into Business Intelligence: Business Intelligence is a multibillion-doll... http://bit.ly/cru0Rt Business Intelligence is a multibillion-dollar market made up of enormous software projects from the likes if various IT giants — think high barriers to entry, long enterprise sales cycles and expensive software licensing. But several cloud-based solutions are in the process of disrupting that market. Link - Trackbacks

items.title: Send Custom Metrics to CloudWatch’s API | Loggly
items.description: Cool - Loggly Blog: Send Custom Metrics to CloudWatch's API: http://bit.ly/l3Wi9R  #aws #loggly
items.content:encoded: Cool - Loggly Blog: Send Custom Metrics to CloudWatch's API: http://bit.ly/l3Wi9R #aws #loggly A few week's ago I wrote up how to implement simple alerting with Loggly and PagerDuty. This week I'm covering how to do something very similar with the new version of Amazon's CloudWatch which they recently released. Amazon doesn't rely on a monitoring agent to collect the metrics for CW, so it's literally a few clicks in the AWS interfac ... Link - Trackbacks
items.dc:creator: loggly.com
items.y:title: Send Custom Metrics to CloudWatch’s API | Loggly

items.title: Loggly |  Pricing
items.description: Just released our new pricing plans: 200MB to 8GB/day & retention from 7 to 180 days.  Starts @ $8/month:  http://logg.ly/s9H
items.content:encoded: Just released our new pricing plans: 200MB to 8GB/day & retention from 7 to 180 days. Starts @ $8/month: http://logg.ly/s9H Use the sliders to set a max per day log volume and index retention time. If you want to retain logs for longer periods you can use Loggly's archive feature to store them in your own S3 bucket. Link - Trackbacks
items.dc:creator: loggly.com
items.y:title: Loggly |  Pricing
